article_title: Free, Open to the Public, and Hiding Your Career Passion
article_text:
Getty Images

Welcome to the library, where lost souls have been finding inspiration and direction for thousands of years.Want to make a career shift? You need to find a role to shift into. Running toward something you want is a lot more satisfying than fleeing something you just can't stand.And just taking what was available is how you found yourself in a job you don't love. Feed your brain. If you don't, it'll stunt your career growth.Don't start with job boards, start with what intrigues you. Roam the shelves until a topic grabs your attention, then investigate.Finding and articulating your passion is more of a treasure hunt than digging around in the fridge for a snack. So go to the place that's literally full of ideas. Let the library guide you.

article_summary:
Getty ImagesWelcome to the library, where lost souls have been finding inspiration and direction for thousands of years.Want to make a career shift?
If you don't, it'll stunt your career growth.Don't start with job boards, start with what intrigues you.
Roam the shelves until a topic grabs your attention, then investigate.Finding and articulating your passion is more of a treasure hunt than digging around in the fridge for a snack.
Running toward something you want is a lot more satisfying than fleeing something you just can't stand.And just taking what was available is how you found yourself in a job you don't love.
You need to find a role to shift into.
